content: **this crochet pattern is free to view online on my website https //hookedonpatterns com/crochet-blog/free-cupcake-pin-cushion-crochet-pattern** the cupcake pin cushion pdf pattern is available to download for a small price the pdf download version includes many in-depth high quality photographs throughout and a bonus 2 colour frosting option which are not available online you will also receive an image-free printer friendly copy crochet some super cute and useful cupcake pin cushions these make a great scrap yarn project as you ll only use less than 20g/30yds of each colour i have used aran/worsted weight cotton yarn with a 4mm hook using a smaller than recommended hook size to keep stitches tight will give extra support for holding your pins you can use any yarn type or weight you prefer but it may effect your ﬁnished cupcake size my cupcakes measure approximately 2 /5cm in diameter at the base and 3 /7 5cm in diameter at the widest point and stands 3 5 / 9cm tall you can make these as play food too of course you ll leave out your pins and just replace the weight pouch with more stufﬁng you could also sew on little beads for the 100 s and 1000 s sprinkles effect you will need aran/worsted weight cotton yarn or your preferred yarn in a beige/cake colour chosen paper casing colour and a frosting colour 4mm crochet hook a stitch marker toy stufﬁng polyester ﬁbre ﬁlling a nylon stocking and dry rice to make a weight pouch optional yarn needle and scissors
